story:
Once upon a time, in a faraway land, there lived a little squirrel named Sammy. Sammy was a curious and adventurous squirrel who loved to explore the forest and make new friends.

Every day, Sammy would scurry from tree to tree, collecting acorns and playing with his forest friends. But as the sun began to set, Sammy would always find his way back to his cozy tree trunk home.

One night, as Sammy was getting ready for bed, he heard a soft rustling in the bushes. Curious, he peeked outside and saw a lost little bird shivering in the cold. Sammy's kind heart led him to invite the bird inside to warm up and rest.

As they curled up together, Sammy told the bird stories of his adventures in the forest, and the bird shared tales of its travels across the sky. The night passed quickly as they laughed and chatted away.

When morning came, the bird thanked Sammy for his kindness and flew off into the sky, promising to return one day. And from that day on, Sammy knew that no matter how big or small, friends could be found in the most unexpected places.

And so, dear child, remember always to be kind and open-hearted like Sammy the squirrel, for you never know when a new friend might appear in your life. With that thought, Sammy closed his eyes, feeling grateful for his new friendship and drifted off into a peaceful sleep under the moonlit sky.

The end. Goodnight, sleep tight, and sweet dreams.
